detail_desc: T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and straight legs.
Dungarees in printed, washed stretch denim with adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Flap chest pocket with a press-stud, side pockets, back pockets and a fake fly.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a text print. Drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, twisted side seams with pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and back of the hem.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with quilted sections at the knees and decorative seams on the back pockets.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Block-coloured top with a text print at the hem, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, block-coloured side stripes and ribbing at the hems.
Calf-length dress in an airy rib knit with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and long, wide sleeves with closely-fitting ribbed cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. High waist with pleats, and wide legs that taper to the hem.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. High waist with pleats, and wide legs that taper to the hem.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey.

Jersey T-shirt in a cotton and modal blend with embroidered text at the neckline.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton and modal blend with embroidered text at the neckline.
Calf-length dress in lightweight scuba fabric with a stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy jersey.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy jersey.

Short jacket in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a drawstring and frill trim.

Short jacket in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a drawstring and frill trim.
Scuba sandals with a text print, two straps with adjustable hook and loop fastenings, a heel strap and a loop at the back. Reflective details and moulded rubber soles.
Scuba sandals with a text print, two straps with adjustable hook and loop fastenings, a heel strap and a loop at the back. Reflective details and moulded rubber soles.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Jetted front pockets, decorative slits at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Hard plastic smartphone case with a selfie light in two places. Built-in battery. USB 2.0 charging cable included. Fits iPhone 6/7. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
